trans-unit.source: Represents a column header for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 代表的資料行標頭<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A GridViewColumnHeader object is a button control that is derived from <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.
trans-unit.target: GridViewColumnHeader 物件是衍生自<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase>按鈕控制項

trans-unit.source: GridViewColumnHeader properties keep track of mouse events and the resizing of columns.
trans-unit.target: 滑鼠事件和資料行的調整大小，持續追蹤的 GridViewColumnHeader 屬性。

trans-unit.source: Column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> view mode are GridViewColumnHeader objects.
trans-unit.target: 中的資料行標頭<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>檢視模式是 GridViewColumnHeader 物件。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: You can customize GridViewColumnHeader objects by using a variety of properties that are found in this class and in related classes.
trans-unit.target: 您可以使用各種不同的屬性，這個類別和相關類別中找到自訂 GridViewColumnHeader 物件。

trans-unit.source: For more information about these properties, and about the precedence between them, see [GridView Column Header Styles and Templates Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關這些屬性，以及它們之間的優先順序的詳細資訊，請參閱[GridView 資料行標頭樣式和範本概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: A GridViewColumnHeader is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>, which means that it can contain a single object of any type (such as a string, an image, or a panel).
trans-unit.target: GridViewColumnHeader 是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>，這表示它可以包含單一物件的任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或工作面板）。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl> class.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>類別。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref>相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"></xref> that is associated with this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn"> </xref>與此相關聯<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Column%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Responds when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> is pressed.
trans-unit.target: 回應時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>如<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>按下。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.AccessText.AccessKey*>

trans-unit.source: The event arguments.
trans-unit.target: 事件引數。

trans-unit.source: Responds to the creation of the visual tree for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 回應建立的視覺化樹狀結構<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and updates the floating version of the header when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> property is set to <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>和更新浮點版本的標頭時的<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>屬性設定為<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not raise the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click> event when a column is changing its position.
trans-unit.target: 不會引發這項實作<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>事件資料行變更其位置時。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.Click>

trans-unit.source: Provides an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref> implementation for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer"></xref>實作<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.GridViewColumnHeaderAutomationPeer"></xref> for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref> event for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.LostKeyboardFocus"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> implementation of <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> clears mouse capture.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>實作<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A>清除滑鼠捕捉。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement.OnLostKeyboardFocus%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>

trans-unit.source: This implementation does not change the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: 此實作不會變更<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A><xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>.</xref:System.Windows.Input.KeyboardFocusChangedEventArgs>屬性</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref> event when the user pauses the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter"></xref>事件，當使用者將滑鼠指標暫停在<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> and its column to a new location in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> by using the mouse.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>事件，當使用者拖曳<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>及其資料行中的新位置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>使用滑鼠。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseEnter>

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理事件，<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>設`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref> event when the mouse moves off the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave"></xref>事件，當滑鼠移離<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave> event when the user drags a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> with the mouse from its old location, to move the header and its column.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>事件，當使用者拖曳<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>使用滑鼠從舊的位置，若要移動的標頭和其資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeave>

trans-unit.source: To handle the event, the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要處理事件，<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>設`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref> event when the user presses the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonDown"></xref>事件，當使用者按滑鼠左鍵時滑鼠指標暫停在<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件，讓<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>可以支援拖放作業移動資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: This method captures the mouse and sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會擷取滑鼠和集合<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>事件引數`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref> event when the user releases the left mouse button while pausing the mouse pointer on the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp"></xref>事件，當使用者放開滑鼠左的按鈕時，滑鼠指標暫停在<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation handles the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp> event (which occurs when the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> property in the <xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> is set to `true`).
trans-unit.target: 此實作會處理<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>事件 (發生於當<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>中的屬性<xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs>設`true`)。</xref:System.Windows.Input.MouseEventArgs> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseLeftButtonUp>

trans-unit.source: It also ends the mouse capture that was set by the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 它也會結束由設定滑鼠捕捉<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.OnMouseLeftButtonDown%2A>

trans-unit.source: This provides a way for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>來支援資料行移動的拖放作業。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseLeftButtonUp%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: This method sets the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法會設定<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>事件引數`true`。</xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Provides class handling for the <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref> event that occurs when the user moves the mouse within a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 提供的類別處理<xref href="System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove"></xref>使用者移動滑鼠內時，就會發生的事件<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the left mouse button in a pressed state while a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn> is moved by a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會保留滑鼠左鍵按下狀態時<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>拖放作業移動。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumn>

trans-unit.source: This also causes the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> to remain set to `true` when the mouse with its left mouse button pressed moves off the header.
trans-unit.target: 這也會導致<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader>保持設定為`true`當按下使用其滑鼠左鍵滑鼠移離標頭。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.ButtonBase.IsPressed%2A>

trans-unit.source: This implementation keeps the <xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A> event argument set to `false` for the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> event so that the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method can support the drag-and-drop operation that moves a column.
trans-unit.target: 此實作會保留<xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>事件引數設定為`false`如<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove>事件，讓<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法可支援的資料行移動拖放作業。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter.OnMouseMove%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.MouseMove> </xref:System.Windows.RoutedEventArgs.Handled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: 事件資料。

trans-unit.source: Responds to a change in <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref> dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 回應中的變更<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>維度。

trans-unit.source: Information about the change in the size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中的大小變更的相關資訊<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the role of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得角色<xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter> class performs layout for the column headers in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> and places an additional column header at the end to add space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>類別會執行中的欄標頭配置<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>，並將其他資料行的標頭加入空格結尾。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewHeaderRowPresenter>

trans-unit.source: A Role value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> identifies this column header in the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>識別在<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridView>這個資料行標頭</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>的角色值

trans-unit.source: A Role value of <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole> identifies a column that is currently the object of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 角色值<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>識別為目前物件的拖放作業的資料行。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole"></xref> enumeration value that specifies the current role of the column.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeaderRole"> </xref>列舉值，指定資料行的目前角色。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role*>

trans-unit.source: The identifier for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別項<xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridViewColumnHeader.Role%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether to serialize a <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否要序列化<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method applies to the following dependency properties: - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty> - <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty>
trans-unit.target: 這個方法適用於下列相依性屬性:- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty>- <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty></xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ToolTipProperty> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.StyleProperty> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ContextMenuProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateSelectorProperty> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.ContentControl.ContentTemplateProperty>

trans-unit.source: The dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 相依性屬性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref> must be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.DependencyProperty"></xref>序列化，否則必須是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 預設值是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
